vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DIACompanyLockup.allocatePremium (yield.sol#669-674):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(kickerWallet,address(this),premiumAmount)) (yield.sol#672)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockBoxStructs (yield.sol#673)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: yieldAmount in DIACompanyLockup.deposit (yield.sol#592) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: l in DIACompanyLockup.deposit (yield.sol#614) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DIACompanyLockup.deposit (yield.sol#589-620):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(yieldWallet,address(this),yieldAmount)) (yield.sol#602)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(kickerWallet,address(this),kickerAmount)) (yield.sol#607)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount)) (yield.sol#611)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockBoxStructs (yield.sol#618)
